patthana16.62:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.62:1.1_1: naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
patthana16.62:1.1_2: āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva
patthana16.62:1.1_3: naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva
patthana16.62:1.1_4: āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto
patthana16.62:1.1_5: ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.62:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.62:2.1_1: naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
